coach.bio: Steve is a former engineering leader who built Askia to solve a simple problem: top talent shouldn’t be invisible. His approach blends real hiring‑table insight with crisp positioning and execution‑focused coaching.

for.title: This is for
for.body: Tech professionals who want a higher level role and a cleaner path to offers.
items: Engineers, data, product, and platform roles
Tech sales, solutions, and customer success roles
Project, program, and product ops roles

notFor.title: Not a fit if
notFor.body: We’re not a generic resume mill or a broad career advice blog.
items: You want mass applying without a strategy
You’re early‑career and need foundational skills
You want a quick template with no guidance

related.title: Ready to start?
related.body: Choose your fastest path to momentum.

items.question: What roles do you specialize in?
items.answer: Software engineering, DevOps/SRE, data, product, and engineering leadership — all targeting $100K–$350K outcomes.

items.question: How quickly can I see results?
items.answer: Most clients see interview momentum within 2–6 weeks once positioning is dialed in.

items.question: Do you guarantee offers?
items.answer: We don’t control hiring decisions, but we guarantee a clear strategy, aligned materials, and execution support.

items.question: Is this only for leaders?
items.answer: No. We work with senior ICs and leaders. The level determines the strategy and deliverables.

items.question: What if I’m unsure of my next role?
items.answer: That’s common. We start by narrowing role families and positioning based on your strengths and market demand.

items.question: Can you help with negotiation?
items.answer: Yes. We build a negotiation plan tied to comp bands and leverage.

items.question: Do you offer resume-only work?
items.answer: Yes — but it’s built around role targeting and market signal, not just formatting.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Book a call and we’ll map the shortest path to your target role.

cta.title: Land a role that matches your level
cta.body: Book a strategy call and we’ll build the plan.
cta.label: Book a Call
